metadata.title: CVE-2020-27534 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: util/binfmt_misc/check.go in Builder in Docker Engine before 19.03.9 callsos.OpenFile with a potentially unsafe qemu-check temporary pathname,constructed with an empty first argument in an ioutil.TempDir call.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
